Aha Atiyyah (Arabic), nke apụtara "ihe (ego ma ọ bụ ngwongwo e nyere dị ka  a na-ewere) natara dị ka onyinye" ma ọ bụ na-apụtakwa "onyinye, onyinye, uru, onyinye, ihu ọma, inye, inye".
A na-asụtakwa aha ahụ Ateah, Atiyeh, Attiah, Attieh, Atieh, Atiya, Atiyya, Attiya, Attiyah, Attyé ma ọ bụ Ateya, Attua, Antuya, Atia
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na:
